entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:42 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -42.8°C
Wind: NNW 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
